name: Cytoscape Session File
summary: Learn about .CYS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Cytoscape is often used in biology, social science, and other research fields to explore relationships among large sets of data. Researchers and data analysts commonly use CYS files to share Cytoscape projects with collaborators or to archive analysis sessions for future reference.

The CYS files make it possible to preserve both the structure of the data and the appearance of the visualization. By reopening a CYS file in Cytoscape, users can restore the session exactly as it was, including all open networks and analysis settings.

instructions: You can open CYS files with Cytoscape. To open the CYS file, select File â†’ Open.
